question: Which country to host the 2018 annual meeting of the Asian Infrastructure Investment Bank (AIIB)?
explanation: The third annual meeting of the board of governors of the Asian Infrastructure Investment Bank (AIIB)  will be held in Mumbai, India in June 2018.  India is AIIB\'s second-largest shareholder. The AIIB is a new multilateral development bank founded to bring countries together to address the daunting infrastructure needs across Asia. The headquarters of AIIB is located in Beijing, China. Its mission is to improve economic and social development in Asia by investing in high quality, financially viable and environmentally friendly infrastructure projects. The 2nd annual meeting of the board of governors was held in Jeju, Republic of Korea in 2017.
